Description copied from interface: AuthDAO
Retrieves a new token. If no phone/session provided then a temporary user will be created

Specified by:
login in interface AuthDAO
Parameters:
phone - String indicating the user phone number
session - String containing the MyOrder SDK sessionId

isAnonymousSession

public java.lang.Boolean isAnonymousSession()
Description copied from interface: AuthDAO
checked if session is Anonymous session. Before calling this method client should call hasSession() method.

Specified by:
isAnonymousSession in interface AuthDAO
Returns:
returns null if user doesn't have any session, true if user has anonymousSession, false if user did proper login
